document_data.name: Ruvya's Toys and Amusements
document_data.mainbody: '''Ruvya's Toys and Amusements''' was a toy shop in the city of [[Bezantur]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Interior: The toyshop had an underground level, concealed through physical and [[magic]]al means, that served as a safehouse for members of the [[Harpers]].
document_data.Services: This business sold a variety of different toys. These included such things as [[doll]]s, [[spinning top]]s, and intricate automata.
document_data.Inhabitants: This shop was owned and operated by [[Ruvya]], an elderly [[spellcaster]] and undercover member of the Harpers.
document_data.Reputation: The toys of Ruvya's were famed throughout not only the city of Bezantur, but in much of [[Faer√ªn]] beyond, with products being sold as far away as [[Waterdeep]]. Even the stern [[Tharchion]] of [[Priador]], [[Aznar Thrul]], had some affection for the store's elderly toymaker.
document_data.History: The shop was potentially closed in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, when the toymaker Ruvya decided he was ready to retire and emigrate from Thay.<ref>
